mapper.select: select subject_id ,title ,reqdep ,type ,apply_s_date ,apply_e_date ,submit_s_date ,submit_e_date ,question_cnt ,team_cnt ,men_cnt ,men_total ,pay_yn ,pay_sum ,pay_date ,description ,regdate ,close_comment ,cont_uuid ,case when sysdate < apply_s_date then '01' when sysdate >= apply_s_date and sysdate <= apply_e_date then '02' when sysdate > apply_e_date and sysdate <= submit_s_date then '03' when sysdate >= submit_s_date and sysdate <= submit_e_date then '04' when sysdate > submit_e_date and sysdate <= submit_e_date+7 then '05' when pay_yn = 'Y' and sysdate > submit_e_date+7 and pay_date is null then '06' when pay_yn = 'Y' and sysdate > submit_e_date+7 and pay_date is not null then '07' else '05' end as status from n_subject where subject_id = #{subject_id}
